name: celestial garden
description:
a game by pataya for ld52

additional art by mim

the universe is your garden : embody a celestial deity, give life... and take it.

plant planets, nurture them to make them livable and once they are ripe enough, harvest them to preserve the cycle of life (and become stronger, while you're at it)

music is from hades - primordial chaos (darren korb)
